name: Pierhead Arcade
description: Play in your own virtual arcade with unlimited tokens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 2500k Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive or Oculus Touch
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive or Oculus Touch

reviews.review_text: Great collection of arcade games. They all work pretty well apart from the bowling part that could use some adjustments. It's fun, you have high scores and there's something for everybody. You even get to use the robot arm to try and pick up prices. Can absolutly recommend these arcade games if you want to kill some time and have some fun, or just show a friend what VR is.

This is a must play for VR guests of all ages. This arcade is soooo well done. The variety of games to play is well worth the price of admission and the prize counter for cashing in your tickets is the icing on the cake.
Like a real Arcade, but without the hordes of children and bad fast food. The tickets and prizes are a very cool addition. My daughter and I had fun playing it.
Not a bad game, oddly addictive. Additon of inernet raido stations for the kuke box is also a great bonus.

ok, cant emphasize how awesome this game is, it really felt like i had dropped into a full arcade when i started this game, and with several different options of what to do, it kept my fiance and I occupied for 5 hours on the first night alone. absolutely recommended! you can play skiiball and shoot the arcade basketball hoops, play a VERY realistic game of bowling, and several other very fun games. one of the highlights of my library, most definitely!
The best arcade simulator. I hope they keep adding more machines.
